local_intent: Execute a 0.1 m push of the T-block at 45 degrees and re-align afterward, ensuring the block remains visible.
assumptions: Block and goal were previously detected
Yaw already set to present pushing edge
coherence_with_global: Matches the Repeat sub-sequence in GLOBAL_BT: Push(distance=0.1, direction=45, timeout=1500) followed by ApproachAndAlign(tolerance=0.01, timeout=1200), preceded by a visibility check.
